title: [Question] Am i supposed to get any documents to the orientation?

comments.body: Nah,just maybe get ur id card maybe
What id card üò≠ i didn't get any
No I got in through early admission in jan itself
What id card ?? I didn't receive any id card ( joining thru kcet)..please reply
U guys will get it later chill
Well usually after counselling u get ur temporary id card
So what do I do for the orientation? Will they accept if I just tell my prn? I didn't attend counseling since I didn't want branch or campus change
Just tell them u didn't get it, u should be fine ig
Uh i actually got my id but i lost it, so am i cookedüôèüèª
Nah...they will give u a  permanent id card after few days... I'm not totally sure but u may have to pay 200 for the tag part ig
